mapper.select: select rownum, fintb.* from (select * from (select etb.*, to_char(e_start_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') str1, to_char(e_end_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd')str2, case when to_char(e_end_day, 'yy/MM/dd')<to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') then '종료' when to_char(e_start_day, 'yy/MM/dd')>to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') then '시작전' when to_char(e_start_day, 'yy/MM/dd')<=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') and to_char(e_end_day, 'yy/MM/dd')>=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') then '진행중' end str3 from (select * from event_tb order by e_num desc) etb) where str3='진행중') fintb

select eventtb.*, total str4 from (select etb.*, to_char(e_start_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') str1, to_char(e_end_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd')str2, case when to_char(e_end_day, 'yy/MM/dd')<to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') then '종료' when to_char(e_start_day, 'yy/MM/dd')>to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') then '시작전' when to_char(e_start_day, 'yy/MM/dd')<=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') and to_char(e_end_day, 'yy/MM/dd')>=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') then '진행중' end str3 from (select * from event_tb where e_num=#{e_num}) etb) eventtb, ( select count(*) total from ecomment_tb where e_num=#{e_num}) cnt where str3='진행중'

select etb.*, m_id from (select ectb.*, to_char(ec_sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') str1, to_char(ec_sysdate, 'hh24:mm:ss') str2 from (select * from ecomment_tb where e_num=#{e_num} order by ec_num desc) ectb) etb, member_tb mtb where mtb.m_num=etb.m_num
select * from (select ec_pw from ecomment_tb where ec_pw=#{ec_pw} and m_num=#{m_num} and e_num=#{e_num} union all select '-' ec_pw from dual) where ec_pw!='-' or rownum =1
mapper.update: update ecomment_tb set ec_content=#{ec_content}, ec_pw=#{ec_pw} where ec_num=#{ec_num} and e_num=#{e_num} and m_num=#{m_num}
mapper.select: select rownum, finaltb.* from (select * from (select * from (select coupon.*, product.p_name from (select etb.e_num, ctb.* from (select e_num, co_num from event_tb where to_char(e_start_day, 'yy/MM/dd')<=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') and to_char(e_end_day, 'yy/MM/dd')>=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') and co_num is not null) etb, (select co_num, co_name, co_start_day, co_end_day, co_type, co_discount, co_sysdate, co_condition, case when co_expiry is null then -99 else co_expiry end co_expiry, case when co_product is null then -99 else co_product end co_product from coupon_tb) ctb where etb.co_num=ctb.co_num) coupon left join product_tb product on product.p_num=coupon.co_product) where e_num=#{e_num} union select -99 e_num, -99 co_num, '-' co_name, null co_start_day, null co_end_day, '-' co_type, -99 co_discount, null co_sysdate, -99 co_condition, -99 co_expiry, -99 co_product, '-' p_name from dual) fintb order by e_num desc) finaltb where e_num!=-99 or rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into c_issue_tb values(ci_seq.nextval, #{m_num}, #{co_num}, sysdate, sysdate+#{co_expiry}, '')
mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select * from c_issue_tb where m_num=#{m_num} and co_num=#{co_num} union select -99 ci_num, -99 m_num, -99 co_num, null ci_issue_day, null ci_end_day, null ci_use_day from dual) order by ci_num desc) where ci_num!=-99 or rownum=1

select rownum, finaltb.* from (select * from (select * from (select coupon.*, product.p_name from (select etb.e_num, ctb.* from (select e_num, co_num from event_tb where to_char(e_end_day, 'yy/MM/dd')<to_char(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd') and co_num is not null) etb, (select co_num, co_name, co_start_day, co_end_day, co_type, co_discount, co_sysdate, co_condition, case when co_expiry is null then -99 else co_expiry end co_expiry, case when co_product is null then -99 else co_product end co_product from coupon_tb) ctb where etb.co_num=ctb.co_num) coupon left join product_tb product on product.p_num=coupon.co_product) where e_num=#{e_num} union select -99 e_num, -99 co_num, '-' co_name, null co_start_day, null co_end_day, '-' co_type, -99 co_discount, null co_sysdate, -99 co_condition, -99 co_expiry, -99 co_product, '-' p_name from dual) fintb order by e_num desc) finaltb where e_num!=-99 or rownum=1
